definitions.definition: ( Greek mythology ) The herald and messenger of the gods, and the god of roads , commerce , invention , cunning , and theft .
The Egyptian Thoth , identified with the Greek Hermes.
( astronomy ) The planet Mercury when observed as an evening star .

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) The herald and messenger of the gods, and the god of roads , commerce , invention , cunning , and theft .
secondary_definitions: The Egyptian Thoth , identified with the Greek Hermes.
( astronomy ) The planet Mercury when observed as an evening star .

definitions.definition: A head or bust on a square base , often double-faced.

main_definition: ( art ) A head or bust on a square base , often double-faced.
